thread.title: Great place to stay since its renovation
thread.title_full: Great place to stay since its renovation - Review of Hilton Garden Inn San Francisco Airport North, South San Francisco, CA - TripAdvisor

author: martin l
title: Great place to stay since its renovation
text: The staff was great and the renovated rooms are very 21st century with amenities a hotel room should now have. Can strongly recommend this hotel for stays in S.F. (it is only 10 minutes on the freeway to the City and costs much less than City hotels.
